comments: What a wonderful teacher. Mr. G is so helpful! I once had a big misunderstanding on an assignment and he emailed me and asked me if I understood and long story short I had mixed up assignments. He let me redo the entire assignment and I received full credit! What a great teacher!

What a knowledgeable, kind, funny and helpful man. He has many good ideas for making SS fun for students. What an amazing instructor!!! He cares about his students and will go above and beyond to help them to be successful. Thanks Mr. G!!!
